captcha.title: Please complete the security verification
captcha.alt: Supports img tag src attribute value

fallback.pageNotFoundDesc: Sorry, we couldn't find the page you were looking for.
fallback.forbiddenDesc: Sorry, but you don't have permission to access this page.
fallback.internalErrorDesc: Sorry, but the server encountered an error.
fallback.offlineErrorDesc: Sorry, can't connect to the internet. Check your connection.

http.requestTimeout: The request timed out. Please try again later.
http.networkError: A network error occurred. Please check your internet connection and try again.
http.badRequest: Bad Request. Please check your input and try again.
http.unauthorized: Unauthorized. Please log in to continue.
http.forbidden: Forbidden. You do not have permission to access this resource.
http.notFound: Not Found. The requested resource could not be found.
http.internalServerError: Internal Server Error. Something went wrong on our end. Please try again later.

widgets.checkUpdatesDescription: Click to refresh and get the latest version
